## Conformance.AAA type

All criteria needed for level AAA conformance.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
type AAA<V extends Criterion.Version = Criterion.Version.Recommendation> = Criterion.Level.A<V> | Criterion.Level.AA<V> | Criterion.Level.AAA<V>;
```
